content.rendered:
On your mark, get set, decorate! Interior designers are descended upon The Parks Lifestyle Apartments in this year’s Home Decor Expo. Here’s what you can expect…

This September, interior designers have been challenged to decorate and furnish the ultimate in affordable, luxury apartments. You’ll get to see how the designers make magic with luxury lifestyle apartments, as well as pick up a few hacks and tips for getting the most out of your own space, and be amazed at everything The Parks Lifestyle Apartments has to offer. 

The Home Decor Expo is on from 18th to 19th and from the 24th – 26th September, and entrance is free. You can also catch the expo on The Expresso Show. 

Looking for affordable luxury apartments to rent in Midrand? Get in touch today to find out more about luxury apartment rentals at The Parks Lifestyle Apartments @ Riversands.

 

Chat to us!
